name: Sugar Candy Swipe
description:
Test your swiping skills in this exciting, ultra addictive candy matching game, featuring four different and fun modes. Use awesome power-ups to help you along, and play through numerous candy packed levels as you try your hardest to master the game.

FEATURES

* Super-charged match-3 puzzle game play.
* Uniquely different modes; Cough Candy, Monster Munch, Billy the Kid and Schools Out
* Many different types of delicious looking candy - don’t let your friends catch you lick the screen :)
* Each mode is easy to learn, yet hard to master.
* Explosive power ups.
* Separate leader boards for each mode and a combined board to show who’s really the candy king or queen!
* Progress is saved in every mode - try out the different modes without losing your saves.

Cough Candy
Candy town has been attacked by a very sour tasting candy virus. The population are revolting, as are the sweets! The nasty tasting candies have occupied the board and injected their virus into the tiles, turning them sickly brown. Your mission is to swipe and remove the rougue candies, killing the virus in the tiles and turning them back to their normal sweet color.

Monster Munch
The candy monsters, Fungy, Freddie, Flora, Fury and Flimsy are very, very hungry. Their keeper took an unexpected holiday and has left them without any of their favourite food, candy! Your job is to collect the candy and feed the monsters before time runs out.

Billy the Kid
You've been charged with looking after little Billy. His Dad’s gone shopping and left you to keep him happy! Don't panic! Billy loves candy, and you've got plenty.

Schools Out
Help! The candy store is low on candy and a bus load of hungry kids have just arrived! Your job is to make sure the store has enough candy to feed the kids, before time runs out and the kids have to get back on the bus.

GAME PLAY

Match 3 games are puzzle games. You need to match 3 or more candies by swiping them with your finger in any direction. Swiped candy are removed from the board and new candy dropped back onto the board. Matching more than 6 pieces of candy can trigger the spawning of power ups with special abilities, helping you clear larger areas of the board.
